Posts.Content: Aug 22, 2008 05:14AM paulinew wrote: Mary Lou,  I am in the middle of my chemo treatments, what I did before I started was make an appointment with a ND who put me on alot of vitamins and minerals.  She was very helpful in suggesting what kind of diet to be on too.  After my chemo is over we plan on a total detox  so that my liver and kidneys ect. will be flushed of all chemicals.  Since starting this treatment which my oncologist is very aware of , I have been able to continue to work.  I have a housecleaning business.  I feel my worst right after chemo treatment but I have been told that my side affects are not too bad.  I am living in CA but am sure there must be a ND in your area.  They are starting to work along side oncologists because of the positive affects it has on patients.  These natural medicine doctors are wonderful. Pauline
Posts.Title: Still have the fatigue after 2 years. Mary-Lou Molly2013
